question: How to get rid of black magic!
answer:
QUESTION
A-o-A Mufti sahab, My relatives have done black magic on my sisters, due to which they are not getting married. We have talked to various people, they all have pointed out ONE aunt of mine, but they all have said the Magic is too strong & they have nothing to break it. One guy gave us some Abstract wrting but since it wasnt islamic way , we did use it. Please HELP US. We are deperately seeking some help, my sisters are doing 500 darood daily & we all pray to Allah to get rid of this magic. Please tell us if you know someone in Islamabad who can help us or you tell us some Wazifa for it Jazak-Allah-Khair
ANSWER


Share:
May Allah Ta'ala assist you.

We are based in South Africa. Continue making Du'aa. The strength of that is
stronger than anything. Be sure of that.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
